name: Charles Goes Vroom
description:
At the 2020 British GP, Charles Leclerc got to take an old Ferrari 375F1 for a few laps around the Silverstone Circuit. The whole "old meets new" vibe of it all inspired me to paint a watercolor painting to commemorate the moment from my perspective. As fate would have it, my painting would inspire me to create my first ever NFT. 

I scanned the original 9in x 12in watercolor painting onto my computer and managed to dusted off my photoshop cobwebs to create this animated painting. 

I hope you enjoy it as much as i enjoyed creating it!
